note.p: Education: Winchester College; New College, Oxford; BCL (1720), DCL (1733); LLD; Incorporated at Cambridge (from Christ Church) 1749

Career: Rector of Hannington, Hampshire (1728-1731); Rector of Houghton (1729-1732); Prebendary of Chichester (1730); Prebendary of Winchester (1731); Vicar of Buriton (1732); Canon of Christ Church, Oxford (1733); Vicar of Portsea (1751)
